attributes.action: Ban the Creation and Consuming of Cheese and Tomato Sandwiches
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We feel that Cheese and Tomato should never be mixed 
Cheese is bad enough, without the Tomato
And to add bread on either side its REVOLTING 
Please Follow me forward to a greater britain

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
